Congratulations to The Arc Southern Maryland on their recent acquisition of a $15,000 local grant from our national partner, Comcast NBCUniversal for the implementation of a

Learning Lab! The Arc just wrapped up our second year of running learning labs at several chapters throughout the country. The Arc Southern Maryland is a prime example of how building partnerships at the local level can have a major impact on the individuals that we support.

headline: “The Arc Files Two IDEA Amicus Briefs” image: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f3/Seal_of_the_United_States_Supreme_Court.svg date: 2015-08-18 09:09:59 categories: fusion-news —

The Arc recently filed two amicus briefs on the rights of students with disabilities under the IDEA in Endrew F. v. Douglas (before the U.S. Supreme Court) and, with The Arc Connecticut, CCJEF v. Rell (before the Connecticut Supreme Court). Both briefs can be found here. Recently, attorneys from The Arc attended oral arguments before the Supreme Court of the United States in the Endrew case. The New York Times covered the arguments.
